name: Pinball Puzzle
description:
In this game you play a continually rolling ball, rolling your way ever deeper into an unknown machine.

Use space bar, left mouse button, or a single tap to interact.

1.2 Update:

  • Added tips to more obscure actions
  • Added Particle Effects
  • Improved spike death animation and sound
  • Player animates towards goal now instead of warping
  • Re-arranged some levels to avoid players getting stuck
  • Faded the background

1.1 Update:

  • Smoothed edges
  • Refactored last level
  • Improved door and button graphics
  • Windows .exe is standalone and not an installer
  • Improved goal visibility
  • Forced Android to use landscape for a better playing experience
  • Removed unfinished levels
